protocol_name: Immunofluorescence staining of heparan sulfate (HS) in islet beta cells of formalin-fixed human pancreas and isolated islets
protocol_name_html: Immunofluorescence staining of heparan sulfate (HS) in islet beta cells of formalin-fixed human pancreas and isolated islets
description: Paraffin sections of formalin-fixed human pancreas and isolated human islets were treated with 0.05% pronase for antigen retrieval, blocked with 2% bovine serum albumin (BSA; Sigma)/phosphate buffered saline (PBS), incubated overnight (4°C) with 10E4 (anti-HS) mAb (1/10; US Biological/Amsbio), washed and stained with AlexaFluor 488-goat anti-mouse IgM (Thermo Fisher). The same sections were washed, incubated with rabbit anti-human glucagon IgG (Abcam) or guinea-pig anti-pig insulin Ig (Dako), washed and stained with Alexafluor 568-donkey anti-rabbit IgG or AlexaFluor 568-goat anti-guinea-pig IgG (Thermo Fisher). The specificity of HS staining was checked on serial sections using IgMκ isotype control (BD Biosciences), instead of 10E4 mAb, together with anti-glucagon or anti-insulin antibody. Nuclei were stained with DAPI (0.2 μg/ml; Sigma). Sections were photographed using an automated Axio Observer inverted fluorescence microscope (Zeiss). Merged images were prepared using ZEN (version 2.3) software (Zeiss).
before_start:
Materials:

       1.  Prepare graded alcohols and xylene for deparaffinizing tissue sections: 2 x xylene (250 ml/slide container), 2 x absolute ethanol (250 ml/slide container), 1 x 90% ethanol (250 ml), 1 x 70% ethanol (250 ml).

  1. Prepare 2% bovine serum albumin (BSA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS).

  2. Mabs and pAbs:
    10E4 (anti-HS) mAb, Amsbio #370255-1
    Goat anti mouse IgM AF488, Thermo Fisher #A21042
    Polyclonal guinea pig anti-pig insulin, DAKO#A0564
    Rabbit polyclonal anti-human glucagon, Abcam #ab133195
    Goat anti-guinea pig IgG AF568, Thermo Fisher #A11075
    Donkey anti-rabbit IgG AF568, Thermo Fisher #A10042
    IgMκ, BD Biosciences #550340

  3. Other reagents:
    Pronase, Calbiochem #537088
    Bovine serum albumin,3Sigma #A3294
    DAPI, Sigma #D9524
    ProLong Diamond Antifade Mountant, Thermo Fisher #P36961
protocol_affiliation: The John Curtin School of Medical Research, The Australian National University
manuscript_citation: Simeonovic CJ, Popp SK, Starrs LM, Brown DJ, Ziolkowski AF, Ludwig B, Bornstein SR, Wilson JD, Pugliese A, Kay TWH, Thomas HE, Loudovaris T, Choong FJ, Freeman C, Parish CR (2018) Loss of intra-islet heparan sulfate is a highly sensitive marker of type 1 diabetes progression in humans. PLoS ONE 13(2): e0191360. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0191360
keywords: heparan sulfate, immunofluorescence staining, human pancreas

authors_list.name: Sarah Popp
authors_list.affiliation: The John Curtin School of Medical Research, The Australian National University

authors_list.name: Charmaine Simeonovic
authors_list.affiliation: The John Curtin School of Medical Research, The Australian National University

guidelines:
10E4 anti-heparan sulfate (HS) mAb identifies highly sulfated HS localised in human beta cells but does not identify the less sulfated HS in alpha cells.

 

Reference:

Theodoraki A, Hu Y, Poopalasundaram S et al (2015) Mol Cell Endocrinol 399: 296-310.

components.data: See Guidelines, 'Before starting'.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: See Guidelines, 'Before starting'.

components.data: Deparaffinize slides in each xylene for 1 min (see Guidelines). Rehydrate slides in graded alcohols beginning in absolute ethanol (10 dips)/ container of absolute ethanol), followed by 90% ethanol (10 dips) and 70% ethanol (10 dips). Wash well in running tap water for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Deparaffinize slides in each xylene for 1 min (see Guidelines). Rehydrate slides in graded alcohols beginning in absolute ethanol (10 dips)/ container of absolute ethanol), followed by 90% ethanol (10 dips) and 70% ethanol (10 dips). Wash well in running tap water for 5 min.

components.data: Wipe around sections with a tissue, encircle the sections using a diamond pencil and place in a slide container of tap water (250 ml).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wipe around sections with a tissue, encircle the sections using a diamond pencil and place in a slide container of tap water (250 ml).

components.data: Prewarm slide tray containing low level of water (to humidify) in 37°C incubator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prewarm slide tray containing low level of water (to humidify) in 37°C incubator.

components.data: Prepare pronase (#537088 Calbiochem; for antigen retrieval to expose HS epitopes): 2.5 mg pronase in 5 ml de-ionized water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare pronase (#537088 Calbiochem; for antigen retrieval to expose HS epitopes): 2.5 mg pronase in 5 ml de-ionized water.

components.data: Wipe around sections using tissue and cover each section with pronase solution. Return humidified slide tray to 37°C incubator for 10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wipe around sections using tissue and cover each section with pronase solution. Return humidified slide tray to 37°C incubator for 10 min.

components.data: Wash sections with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash sections with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.

components.data: Block sections with 2% bovine serum albumin (BSA) in PBS at room temperature for 30 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Block sections with 2% bovine serum albumin (BSA) in PBS at room temperature for 30 min.

components.data: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.

components.data: Apply primary 10E4 anti-HS mAb, 100 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section. Incubate overnight at 4°C in a humidified tray (containing PBS).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply primary 10E4 anti-HS mAb, 100 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section. Incubate overnight at 4°C in a humidified tray (containing PBS).

components.data: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.

components.data: Apply secondary goat anti mouse IgM AF488 (Thermo Fisher #A21042), 20 μg/ml with 2% BSA/PBS), 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply secondary goat anti mouse IgM AF488 (Thermo Fisher #A21042), 20 μg/ml with 2% BSA/PBS), 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

components.data: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.

components.data:
Apply anti-insulin or anti-glucagon pAb:

(a) For insulin staining, apply polyclonal guinea pig anti-insulin (DAKO #A0564), 130 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

(b) For glucagon staining, apply rabbit polyclonal anti-glucagon (Abcam #ab133195), 10 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Apply anti-insulin or anti-glucagon pAb:

(a) For insulin staining, apply polyclonal guinea pig anti-insulin (DAKO #A0564), 130 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

(b) For glucagon staining, apply rabbit polyclonal anti-glucagon (Abcam #ab133195), 10 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

components.data: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 3 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides at 0, 2, and 5 min of each wash.

components.data:
Apply secondary antibodies for anti-insulin or anti-glucagon pAb:

(a) For insulin staining, apply goat anti-guinea pig IgG AF568 (Thermo Fisher #A11075), 10 μg/ml dilution in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

(b) For glucagon staining, apply donkey anti-rabbit IgG AF568 (Thermo Fisher #A10042), 4 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Apply secondary antibodies for anti-insulin or anti-glucagon pAb:

(a) For insulin staining, apply goat anti-guinea pig IgG AF568 (Thermo Fisher #A11075), 10 μg/ml dilution in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

(b) For glucagon staining, apply donkey anti-rabbit IgG AF568 (Thermo Fisher #A10042), 4 μg/ml in 2% BSA/PBS, 125 μl/section, and incubate for 30 min at room temperature.

components.data: Stain sections with DAPI (Sigma #D9524), 0.2 μg/ml in PBS for 2 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Stain sections with DAPI (Sigma #D9524), 0.2 μg/ml in PBS for 2 min.

components.data: Wash sections with PBS, 3 x, then 1 x 5 min in slide container containing 250 ml PBS with agitation of slides (10 x) at 0, 2.5 min and 5 min.

components.data: Mount slides in ProLong® Diamond Antifade Mountant (Thermo Fisher #P36961).

source_data.description: Mount slides in ProLong® Diamond Antifade Mountant (Thermo Fisher #P36961).
